title: 384 - 3 Sources of Creative Fuel for When You're Running on Empty with Hanif Abdurraqib
description:
Listen and Subscribe on Apple, Spotify and more: https://link.chtbl.com/creativepeptalk

Support the show at patreon.com/creativepeptalk!

Transcripts available at creativepeptalk.com/episodes!

_________

SHOW NOTES

Object of Sound Podcast with Hanif Abdurraqib by Sonos

Source Material (feat. Sufjan Stevens and Angelo De Augustine)

Everything You Hear Belongs to You (feat. Bartees Strange)

Storytelling Through Song (feat. Danielle Ponder)

America's Dead Podcast by Sonos

How to Make a Podcast: Plan, Record, and Launch with Success - Skillshare Class

_________

CALL TO ADVENTURE

How can you tell an old story in a new way?

_________

SPONSORS

ASTROPAD DARKBOARD
Darkboard is a new ultra-light ergonomic drawing surface for iPad. It’s developed by the creators of Astropad Studio, long-time friends of the podcast.
They created Darkboard to fix some of the most common pain points of artists — like hand cramps, bad posture, and being stuck at your desk. The Kickstarter to fund the creation of the Darkboard is LIVE NOW!! The first backers get the best rewards - so go check it out at darkboard.com

SKILLSHARE
There’s nothing better than getting better. Accomplishing growth is extremely satisfying, and online classes from Skillshare make it possible. Learn about illustration, design, photography, productivity, and marketing. With Skillshare’s short classes, you can move your creative journey forward without putting life on hold. So explore your creativity at Skillshare.com/CreativePep where our listeners get a free trial of Premium Membership.
author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (Co-Loop Podcast Network)

itunes:title: 384 - 3 Sources of Creative Fuel for When You're Running on Empty with Hanif Abdurraqib
itunes:author: Co-Loop Podcast Network
itunes:summary:
Do you ever feel like you’ve  run out of creativity or that you have nothing left to say? If you need a creative refuel, this episode with writer, poet and music enthusiast and critic Hanif Abdurraqib is for you.

In this episode we share 3 tips for staying full creatively by exploring lessons from Hanif as well as from the musician’s he interviews in his incredible podcast Object of Sound.
itunes:subtitle:

itunes:keywords: creative pep talk, hanif abdurraqib, creativity, making, creative practice, andy j pizza, creative block, career, creative, motivation, writing, inspiration, art
